search.initial-msg: Adjust the settings for a better search experience
search.empty-msg: Nothing found, try changing your search parameters

favorite.empty-msg: Before continuing, please add a movie to your 'Will Watch' list or give it a rating
favorite.remove-b: Are you sure you want to delete

stat.empty-msg: To view statistics rate several films or change parametrs
stat.pie-empty-msg: There is no statistics on the selected parameters

manage.unban-message: Do you really want to unblock

login.name: Name
login.forget-msg: A link to change your password has been sent to your email.

unauthorized-msg: The user does not have the required rights to view this page.

ban.msg: restrictions have been placed on your account
ban.one: 1. You cannot add, delete or change movies in your collection.
ban.two: 2. Viewing the statistics page is not available.
ban.three: 3. Viewing the page with a list of users is not available.

boundary.b: Please refresh the page or return to the home page to try again.

toast.hidden-add: The film will not be displayed in the general feed and will not be taken into account in statistics
toast.hidden-remove: The film is again displayed in the general feed and taken into account in statistics
toast.remove-hidden: <movieLink>{{title}}</movieLink> is displayed again in the general feed

no-film-msg: There are no items to display
end-box-msg: You have reached the end of the list

user.name: User name
user.photo-delete-msg: Are you sure you want to delete your profile photo?
user.photo-format-msg: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, JPEG, WEBP
user.devices-end-all-msg: Are you sure you want to end all sessions except the current one?
user.devices-end-msg: Do you really want to end the session
user.password-check-msg: For security reasons, please enter your password to continue.

unauth.default-msg: The user does not have the required rights to view this page.

msg.login-or-auth: Log in or register to use all the features of the service.

privacy.tos-introduction-text: These terms of service (\"Terms\") govern your use of the Cinemaze application (\"App\"). Please read these Terms carefully before using the App.
privacy.tos-acceptable-use-text: You agree to use the App only for lawful purposes and not to infringe the rights of other users.
privacy.tos-prohibited-item-1: Using the App to distribute malicious software.
privacy.tos-prohibited-item-2: Using the App to violate copyrights or other intellectual property rights.
privacy.tos-prohibited-item-3: Posting or distributing offensive, obscene, or illegal material.
privacy.tos-limitation-liability-text: We are not liable for any loss or damage resulting from your use of or inability to use the App. The App is provided \"as is,\" without any warranties.
privacy.tos-intellectual-property-text: All rights to the content and software of the App are owned by Cinemaze or its licensors. Nothing in these Terms grants you any rights to use such materials beyond the use of the App.
privacy.tos-changes-text: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Updated Terms will be posted on this page and will take effect upon posting. Continued use of the App after changes signifies your acceptance of the new Terms.
privacy.tos-contact-info-text: If you have any questions about our Terms, please contact us at:
privacy.policy-introduction-text: Your privacy is important to us. This privacy policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and how we protect your information.
privacy.policy-data-collection-text: We may collect the following types of data:
privacy.policy-data-collection-item-2: App usage data (e.g., actions within the app)
privacy.policy-data-usage-text: We use the collected data for:
privacy.policy-data-usage-item-3: Communicating with users regarding app usage
privacy.policy-data-transfer-text: We do not share your data with third parties, except as required by law or necessary to provide our services.
privacy.policy-data-security-text: We take reasonable measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction.
privacy.policy-user-rights-text: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your data. To exercise these rights, please contact us at the address below.
privacy.policy-contact-info-text: If you have any questions about our privacy policy, please contact us at:
